title: folk_tales_The_Olive-Tree_and_the_Fig-Tree
text:
source: https://fairytalez.com/olive-tree-fig-tree/.
nation: greek.
title: The Olive-Tree and the Fig-Tree.
text: An Olive-tree taunted a Fig-tree with the loss of her leaves at a certain season of the year. “You,” she said, “lose your leaves every autumn, and are bare till the spring: whereas I, as you see, remain green and flourishing all the year round.” Soon afterwards there came a heavy fall of snow, which settled on the leaves of the Olive so that she bent and broke under the weight; but the flakes fell harmlessly through the bare branches of the Fig, which survived to bear many another crop..
